name: Farm Vigilante
description:
Info

Collect all three hidden collectables and return to one of the barns to solve the murder mistery! But watch out for the scarecrow! He'll try to stop you from finding the items and he will NEVER stop! Try to throw haybales or pigs at him to temporarily stun him or to block his path!

Controls

WASD + Mouse - Movement

Left shift - Run

Left click - Pick up/throw Haybale/Piggy
